text: <!channel> ARYA TOURS FRIDAY. (still not confirmed). So I’ve put a signup form by the main doorway with 4 pm and 4:30 pm slots for tomorrow in case we get confirmation we can go. Sign up and getcher own self over there all timely like, watch this channel for updates about whether, oh, it is actually happening. :stuck_out_tongue: If you’ve gone before it’d be great if you didn’t sign up again, yet, cause it’s pulling teeth to get this opportunity.
PS there may be a future opportunity to have happy hour at Slammer and go in after hours.
Please make the time to go! This is an amazing (and once in our officetime opp) to see this building in progress!
4 pm confirmed, sign up, sign up!
Go peeps, you won't regret it :))
